Detailed Description

FeatureItem wraps a feature, which is a piece of functionality provided by an application or plugin. FeatureItems are used to display and execute features in menus and list windows. The feature item specifies text and icon, in case the feature is displayed in a GUI element. Feature items can have a context id, which is used, when selecting the feature item in a menu. If no context id is set, the context id of the featureitemcontainer is used. If this also has no context id, the context of the window is used.
